description: The scheduler and nova-manage check for service being alive in different ways. Additionally there are issues when the host checking the liveness has clock set N seconds in the future and the checked service just updated the timestamp. Negative time differences (-1 day, +many seconds) were not accounted for properly.
title: Make service liveness checks more consistent / correct

comments.content: The scheduler and nova-manage check for service being alive in different ways. Additionally there are issues when the host checking the liveness has clock set N seconds in the future and the checked service just updated the timestamp. Negative time differences (-1 day, +many seconds) were not accounted for properly.

comments.content: Note that synchronized clocks is a basic requirement.
